tool_description: The world's cheapest Realtime stock data provider

api_list.name: asset-profile
api_list.description: Provides detailed information about a specific asset, including the company's physical address, contact information, number of full-time employees, and more.

required_parameters.name: symb
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.

api_list.name: finance-analytics
api_list.description: Returns financial analysis and AI recommendations for a specific asset, assessing its viability, stability, and profitability.

required_parameters.name: symb
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.

api_list.name: balance-sheet
api_list.description: Provides the balance sheet of a company, detailing its assets, liabilities, and shareholder equity.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company.

api_list.name: earnings-trend
api_list.description: Reflects the company's profits over time and provides expert and AI-supported predictions about future stock behavior.

required_parameters.name: symbl
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.

api_list.name: historic data
api_list.description: Returns historical stock data based on specified intervals and ranges.

required_parameters.name: range
required_parameters.description: The time range for which the data is returned.

required_parameters.name: interval
required_parameters.description: The time interval between two data points.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.

api_list.name: earnings
api_list.description: Returns a company's earnings, which is its after-tax net income, along with historical earnings data.

required_parameters.name: symb
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.

api_list.name: options
api_list.description: Provides option chain data for a specific stock, detailing calls and puts for various strike prices.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.

api_list.name: price
api_list.description: Returns the real-time stock price information for the specified symbol.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.

api_list.name: index-trend
api_list.description: Analyzes trends based on historical relationships between operational indices and labor demand.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.

api_list.name: esg-score
api_list.description: Measures a company's exposure to long-term environmental, social, and governance risks.

required_parameters.name: symb
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the asset.
